titleStmt.title: The nevv army regulated. Wherein is set forth, what officers which are now allowed, are unnecessary, and the disaduantages that hath and may arise, by the same if not reformed. As it was presented to the Honourable Houses of Parliament by the author.
titleStmt.author: J. B. (John Brandon)

notesStmt.note: The same setting of type, with different t.p., was also issued as "The reformed army" (Wing B4249).
Annotation on Thomason copy: "March 22th 1644"; the 5 in imprint date is crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
